dmca.title: NOT A C&D
dmca.body:
My company,ReWerx,has a Trade Mark pending and owns www.rewerx.com,.org,net,.ca.  Since January 1, 2001 I've been trying to get Google and DMOZ to fix a typo that sent search engine leads for "rewerx" to "rexwerx".  DMOZ won't reply or acknowledge their error. It all starts here -- http://dmoz.org/Arts/Crafts/Glass/Blowing/Lampworking/ and gets picked up by other search engines and compounded.  Can you suggest any remedy?

Well over a year ago (1/30/2001) I sent this (and since then numerous other notes):

"ReWerx is a trademarked name for a Canadian corporation.  It is also a
registered domain name.

Somehow your site and its page
http://dmoz.org/Arts/Crafts/Glass/Blowing/Lampworking/
lists rewerx as a hyperlink to a group that sells glass pipes and bongs for smoking pot!  Naturally we're miffed.

Please correct and confirm the correction directly to:"

Bruce Gillespie
ReWerx
604-264-0010
bg@rewerx.com
